001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.controller;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import android.net.Uri;
005import android.os.Bundle;
006import android.view.LayoutInflater;
007import android.view.View;
008import android.view.ViewGroup;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
011import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
012import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
013import com.kizitonwose.calendar.core.CalendarMonth;
014import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.adapter.DayBinder;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.adapter.HeaderBinder;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.databinding.FragmentCalendarBinding;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod.MediaType;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.viewmodel.ApodViewModel;
022import java.time.DayOfWeek;
023import java.time.LocalDate;
024import java.time.YearMonth;
025import java.time.temporal.WeekFields;
026import java.util.Locale;
027import java.util.Map;
028import javax.inject.Inject;
029import kotlin.Unit;
030
031@AndroidEntryPoint
032public class CalendarFragment extends Fragment {
033
034  @Inject
035  DayBinder dayBinder;
036  @Inject
037  HeaderBinder headerBinder;
038
039  private FragmentCalendarBinding binding;
040  private ApodViewModel viewModel;
041  private YearMonth selectedMonth;
042
043  @Nullable
044  @Override
045  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
046      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
047    binding = FragmentCalendarBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
048    setupCalendar();
049    return binding.getRoot();
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
054    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
055    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(ApodViewModel.class);
056    setupCalendar();
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public void onDestroyView() {
061    binding = null;
062    super.onDestroyView();
063  }
064
065  private void setupCalendar() {
066    LocalDate firstApodDate = LocalDate.parse(getString(R.string.first_apod_date));
067    YearMonth firstApodMonth = YearMonth.from(firstApodDate);
068    DayOfWeek firstDayOfWeek = WeekFields.of(Locale.getDefault())
069        .getFirstDayOfWeek();
070    YearMonth currentMonth = YearMonth.now();
071    LocalDate today = LocalDate.now();
072
073    binding.calendarView.setup(currentMonth.minusMonths(6), currentMonth.plusMonths(6),
074        today.getDayOfWeek());
075    binding.calendarView.scrollToMonth(currentMonth);
076
077    binding.calendarView.setDayBinder(dayBinder);
078
079    binding.calendarView.setMonthHeaderBinder(headerBinder);
080    binding.calendarView.setup(firstApodMonth, currentMonth, firstDayOfWeek);
081    binding.calendarView.setMonthScrollListener(this::handleMonthScroll);
082  }
083
084  @NonNull
085  private Unit handleMonthScroll(CalendarMonth calendarMonth) {
086    viewModel.setYearMonth(calendarMonth.getYearMonth());
087    return Unit.INSTANCE;
088  }
089
090  private void handleYearMonth(YearMonth yearMonth) {
091    if (!yearMonth.equals(selectedMonth)) {
092      binding.calendarView.scrollToMonth(yearMonth);
093      selectedMonth = yearMonth;
094    }
095  }
096
097  private void showApod(Apod apod) {
098    if (apod.getMediaType() == MediaType.IMAGE) {
099//      Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot())
100//          .navigate(CalendarFragmentDirections.showImage(apod.getId()));
101    } else {
102      Intent intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, Uri.parse(apod.getLowDefUrl().toString()));
103      startActivity(intent);
104    }
105
106  }
107
108  private void handleApods(Map<LocalDate, Apod> apodMap) {
109    Map<LocalDate, Apod> binderMap = dayBinder.getApodMap();
110    binderMap.clear();
111    binderMap.putAll(apodMap);
112    apodMap
113        .keySet()
114        .stream()
115        .map(YearMonth::from)
116        .distinct()
117        .forEach(binding.calendarView::notifyMonthChanged);
118  }
119
120}
